alert.note: Alert for Scott (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 11:44PM EST until February 18 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia...Tennessee... Clinch River At Cleveland VA affecting Wise, Russell and Scott Counties. Clinch River Near Speers Ferry VA affecting Hancock and Scott Counties. Clinch River Above Tazewell TN affecting Hancock, Grainger and Claiborne Counties. North Fork Holston River Near Gate City VA affecting Hawkins, Sullivan and Scott Counties. Pigeon River At Newport TN affecting Cocke County. Powell River Near Arthur TN affecting Claiborne and Union Counties. Powell River Near Jonesville VA affecting Hancock and Lee Counties. Sequatchie River Near Whitwell TN affecting Bledsoe, Sequatchie and Marion Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Clinch River near Speers Ferry VA. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, County Road 627 just downstream floods. At 21.0 feet, One or two houses are threatened. At 24.0 feet, A few additional homes are affected. Evacuations are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM EST Friday the stage was 21.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:15 PM EST Friday was 21.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 400 AM EST /300 AM CST/.
